On my m3 DS real (firmware v 4.8 e ) its works, but completly freezes on sea travel screen.
Oh, and if you try to use limit skill 'Cross Slash' it freezes too.

This is the same dump that is available everywhere. It's either bad, or it's got some weird AP stuff on it.

Long story short: Certain skills will crash your game, as will trying to do any of the sea stuff.

Going to have to wait a bit longer for this. Which would be better if it was actually available outside the US.

Turns out it was both a dodgy dump and some protection. Somebody is claiming to have patched it now, but you need the full untrimmed 64MB dump (you can get it on demonoid). The patch itself is easily found.
